content: The Family Tree of King Saul of Benjamin(A)
Now Benjamin begot Bela his firstborn, Ashbel the second, Aharah the third,
Nohah the fourth, and Rapha the fifth.
The sons of Bela  Addar, Gera, Abihud,
Abishua, Naaman, Ahoah,
Gera, Shephuphan, and Huram.
These  the sons of Ehud, who were the heads of the fathers’  of the inhabitants of Geba, and who forced them to move to Manahath:
Naaman, Ahijah, and Gera who forced them to move. He begot Uzza and Ahihud.
Also Shaharaim had children in the country of Moab, after he had sent away Hushim and Baara his wives.
By Hodesh his wife he begot Jobab, Zibia, Mesha, Malcam,
Jeuz, Sachiah, and Mirmah. These  his sons, heads of their fathers’
And by Hushim he begot Abitub and Elpaal.
The sons of Elpaal  Eber, Misham, and Shemed, who built Ono and Lod with its towns;
and Beriah and Shema, who  heads of their fathers’  of the inhabitants of Aijalon, who drove out the inhabitants of Gath.
Ahio, Shashak, Jeremoth,
Zebadiah, Arad, Eder,
Michael, Ispah, and Joha  the sons of Beriah.
Zebadiah, Meshullam, Hizki, Heber,
Ishmerai, Jizliah, and Jobab  the sons of Elpaal.
Jakim, Zichri, Zabdi,
Elienai, Zillethai, Eliel,
Adaiah, Beraiah, and Shimrath  the sons of Shimei.
Ishpan, Eber, Eliel,
Abdon, Zichri, Hanan,
Hananiah, Elam, Antothijah,
Iphdeiah, and Penuel  the sons of Shashak.
Shamsherai, Shehariah, Athaliah,
Jaareshiah, Elijah, and Zichri  the sons of Jeroham.
These  heads of the fathers’  by their generations, chief men. These dwelt in Jerusalem.
Now the father of Gibeon, whose wife’s name  Maacah, dwelt at Gibeon.
And his firstborn son  Abdon, then Zur, Kish, Baal, Nadab,
Gedor, Ahio, Zecher,
and Mikloth,  begot Shimeah. They also dwelt alongside their relatives in Jerusalem, with their brethren.
Ner begot Kish, Kish begot Saul, and Saul begot Jonathan, Malchishua, Abinadab, and Esh-Baal.
The son of Jonathan  Merib-Baal, and Merib-Baal begot Micah.
The sons of Micah  Pithon, Melech, Tarea, and Ahaz.
And Ahaz begot Jehoaddah; Jehoaddah begot Alemeth, Azmaveth, and Zimri; and Zimri begot Moza.
Moza begot Binea, Raphah his son, Eleasah his son,  Azel his son.
Azel had six sons whose names  these: Azrikam, Bocheru, Ishmael, Sheariah, Obadiah, and Hanan. All these  the sons of Azel.
And the sons of Eshek his brother  Ulam his firstborn, Jeush the second, and Eliphelet the third.
The sons of Ulam were mighty men of valor—archers.  had many sons and grandsons, one hundred and fifty  These  all sons of Benjamin.
